projects.title: Real-time Data Pipeline
projects.description: Built a scalable real-time data pipeline using Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, and AWS services to process millions of events per day.

projects.title: ETL Data Warehouse
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive ETL solution for a data warehouse using DBT, Airflow, and Snowflake to support business analytics.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Created an interactive analytics dashboard with real-time metrics visualization using React, D3.js, and FastAPI for data insights.
